abstract: Stocks rise ahead of Federal Reserve's decision on whether to raise interest rates.
lead_paragraph: Brewers advanced, too, after Anheuser-Busch InBev made a takeover offer to SABMiller, while Hewlett-Packard announced 30,000 layoffs.

headline.main: Market Rises as Jump in Oil Drives Up Energy Shares
headline.print_headline: Gains Suggest Confidence as Fed Nears Rate Decision

snippet: Brewers advanced, too, after Anheuser-Busch InBev made a takeover offer to SABMiller, while Hewlett-Packard announced 30,000 layoffs.
